  • Constructor Details

    • Line

      public Line​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2, DrawingPanel drawingPanel)

      Construct a new line

      All window coordinates are measured in pixels, with the X-axis increasing from left to right and the Y-axis increasing from top to bottom. All window coordinates exist in the first quadrant.

      Parameters:
      x1 - coordinate of starting point
      y1 - coordinate of starting point
      x2 - coordinate of ending point
      y2 - coordinate of ending point
      drawingPanel - on which to draw

    • Line

      public Line​(java.awt.geom.Point2D p1, java.awt.geom.Point2D p2, DrawingPanel drawingPanel)

      Construct a new line

      Parameters:
      p1 - Starting point
      p2 - Ending point
      drawingPanel - on which to draw

    • setShape

      public void setShape​(java.awt.Shape shape) throws DrawableException

      Replace the underlying Line2D geometry

      Changing the geometry leaves other characteristics (stroke color, style) unchanged.

      Overrides:
      setShape in class Drawable
      Parameters:
      shape - of new geometry (must be and instance of Line2D)
      Throws:
      DrawableException - if shape is not an instance of Line2D
